member.name: T:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceAttribute
member.summary: Controls how the field is treated by the DBC storage loader.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the specified .
member.param: Specifies how the underlying class field should be treated when loading from a DBC storage.

member.name: P:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceAttribute.Option
member.summary: Gets the value that specifies how the underlying class field should be treated when loading from a DBC storage.

member.name: P:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceAttribute.PropertyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of of the property that should be used instead of the underlying class field. Use it with value.

member.name: P:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceAttribute.ArraySize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of elements in the underlying array.

member.summary: Gets the number of records currently contained in the storage.

member.summary: Gets the minimum record id in the storage. Existance of a record with this id is not guaranteed.

member.summary: Gets the maximum record id in the storage. Existance of a record with this id is not guaranteed.

member.name: T:DBFilesClient.NET.LazyCString
member.summary: Lazy C string computes the from the underlying signed byte stream by demand. This functionality is disabled by default. Use to enable.

member.name: T:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceOption
member.summary: Specifies how a class field should be treated when loading from a DBC storage.

member.name: F:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceOption.Include
member.summary: Specifies that the field should be included into the storage entry structure. This is the default behavior.

member.name: F:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceOption.Exclude
member.summary: Specifies that the field should be completely ignored by the DBC stoarge loader.

member.name: F:DBFilesClient.NET.StoragePresenceOption.UseProperty
member.summary: Specifies that the DBC storage loader should use property instead. You should specify the property. The property should be of the same type as the field, and its setter should be public.

member.summary: Enables laziness of .
